    • askDraw

      public void askDraw() throws RemoteException
      This method ask the player for the input to draw an item from the board. The methods check if the input is valid and signals the player if the input is not valid. Once the draw input is done the method sends the draw information to the server. The method does not receive any response from the server.
      Specified by:
      askDraw in interface CLI_commands
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • putDraw

      public void putDraw() throws RemoteException
      This method ask the player for the input to put an item in the bookshelf. The methods check if the input is valid and signals the player if the input is not valid. Once the draw input is done the method sends the draw information to the server. The method does not receive any response from the server.
      Specified by:
      putDraw in interface CLI_commands
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn() throws RemoteException
      This method resets all draw and put parameters, then it sends a request to end turn to the server. This method does not receive any response from the server.
      Specified by:
      endTurn in interface CLI_commands
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • colorTile

      public void colorTile(item[][] table, int i, int j)
      This method is used to change the color of the content of a board or bookshelf based on the content itself. ( in this case the item type define a specific color )
      Specified by:
      colorTile in interface CLI_commands
      Parameters:
      table - is the Board or Bookshelf
      i - row
      j - column

    • replyDraw

      public boolean replyDraw()
      This method checks if a reply for a draw request has been received. If the reply arrives, the value of the reply is returned, else it loops forever.
      Specified by:
      replyDraw in interface CLI_commands
      Returns:
      result of draw request.

    • replyPut

      public boolean replyPut()
      This method checks if a reply for a put request has been received. If the reply arrives, the value of the reply is returned, else it loops forever.
      Specified by:
      replyPut in interface CLI_commands
      Returns:
      result of draw request.

    • replyEndTurn

      public void replyEndTurn()
      This method checks if a reply for end turn request has been sent. If the reply arrives, the value of the reply is returned, else it loops forever.
      Specified by:
      replyEndTurn in interface CLI_commands

    • replaceClient

      public void replaceClient(ClientTCP client)
      This method allow the CLI to replace the reference to the client if the connection is lost and the reconnection protocol has started.
      Specified by:
      replaceClient in interface CLI_commands
      Parameters:
      client - is the client tcp reference.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
